# Banded Mail of Luck
## Overview
**Aura** strong enchantment; **CL** 12th

**Slot** armor

**Price** 18,900 gp

**Weight** 35 lbs.

**Description**

Ten 100-gp gems adorn this *+3 [[Banded Mail|banded mail]]*. Once per week, the armor allows its wearer to require that an attack roll made against him be rerolled. He must take whatever consequences come from the second roll. The wearerâ€™s player must decide whether to have the attack roll rerolled before damage is rolled.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Bless (Spell)|bless]]*

**Cost** 9,650 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 465
